function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of mobility and contact data for infants and children at different educational stages","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of infantile mobility and potential spread of infectious diseases among children","Mitigation":"Collecting and analyzing detailed mobility and contact data for infants and children at various educational stages","Technologies":"Data collection tools, mobility tracking technologies","People":"Infants, children, parents, educational institutions","Owner":"Research organizations, educational institutions, government health authorities"},{"Description":"Unaccounted variations in mobility parameters for infected individuals","Impact":"Inaccurate prediction of infectious disease spread and impact on healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Conducting sensitivity analyses and adjusting mobility parameters for infected individuals based on real-world data","Technologies":"Simulation models, real-time mobility tracking, healthcare data analysis tools","People":"Infected individuals, healthcare providers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research organizations, public health agencies, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Inconsistencies in defining and mapping variables within the numerical grid","Impact":"Potential errors in calculating and simulating disease spread dynamics","Mitigation":"Standardizing variable definitions and mapping procedures within the numerical grid, validating the consistency of mapped variables","Technologies":"Data mapping and validation tools, numerical simulation software","People":"Data analysts, researchers, model developers","Owner":"Research organizations, academic institutions"}]}
